metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23026 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference in the main() function dhry_1.c of dhrystone 2.1causes a denial of service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gcc-3.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
